doc:
Christopher Mayer (American actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christopher_Mayer_(American_actor) 0 Christopher Mayer (born George Charles Mayer III; February 21, 1954 – July 23, 2011), also known as Chip Mayer, was a Manhattan-born American film and TV actor who was best known for portraying Vance Duke on The Dukes of Hazzard for 19 episodes. Christopher_Mayer ( born George_Charles_Mayer_III ; February_21_,_1954 – July_23_,_2011 ) , also_known as Chip_Mayer , was a_Manhattan-born_American_film_and_TV_actor who was_best_known for portraying Vance_Duke on The_Dukes of Hazzard for 19_episodes .
